text: musata api ratrin tihak porondu vi tibunemu. pasuva e samaga (ratrin) dahayak ekkasu kalemu. ebævin ohuge deviyange varaya ratrin hatalihak vasayen puranaya viya. e samagama musa tama sahodara harunta “oba obage janatava atare mage sthanaye sitimin ovunva dæhæmiyan bavata pilisakara karanu mænava!tavada aparadhakarayinge margaya oba anugamanaya nokaranu” yayi pævasuveya
